content.raw:
* Sounds good about the arg name - I'll do something like that.
* We can move things, but no rush. Hard to move things due to backward compatibility, so I wouldn't worry too much. But future things definitely should go there.
* I'm thinking something like a 'required BLACS plugins' list stored in the shot file, BLACS can reject the shot if it doesn't have the required plugins active.
content.html:
• Sounds good about the arg name - I'll do something like that.
  • We can move things, but no rush. Hard to move things due to backward compatibility, so I wouldn't worry too much. But future things definitely should go there.
  • I'm thinking something like a 'required BLACS plugins' list stored in the shot file, BLACS can reject the shot if it doesn't have the required plugins active.
